SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AimBullet
The AimBullet class is a subClass of the superClass BulletEntity.
AimWeapon
The AimWeapon class is a subclass of the abstract superclass Weapon It represents a Weapon shooting a AimBullet It will create a AimBullet when called from a SpaceEntity object
Asteroid
The class representing the Asteroid enemy that one shoot the player and goes slowly in a straight line
BasicBullet
The BasicBullet class is a subclass of the superClass BulletEntity.
BasicWeapon
The BasicWeapon class is a subclass o the abstract superclass Weapon.
Boss
The Boss class represents the boss Body
BossPart
The bossPart represents the boss arm
BulletEntity
The Bullet class is an abstract class representing a generic weapon in the game.
Clock
Class to implement a timer
Coin
A class to represents a coin that only grants a big score bonus and gain money for the shop
CollectibleEntity
An abstract class representing a collectible entity in the game.
CosmicCharger
The CosmicCharger Enemy is an aggressive but weak entity that randomly shoot toward the player It is the most common enemy, deals little damage and has few hp too.
DamageBonus
A class representing a damage bonus collectible entity in the game.
Enemy
The Enemy class represents an enemy spaceship in the game.
Entity
An abstract class representing a game entity.
GalacticGunner
The GalacticGunner Enemy is a continuously moving entity that randomly shoot toward the player It is the most common enemy, deals little damage and has few hp too.
GameButton
A class that represents all the button used
Global
The Global class contains global data and constants used throughout the application.
Hearth
A class representing a hearth collectible entity in the game.
HitBox
The HitBox class represents a rectangular HitBox.
HomingBullet
The HomingBullet class is a subClass of the superClass BulletEntity.
HomingWeapon
The HomingWeapon class is a subclass of the abstract superclass Weapon It represents a Weapon shooting a HomingBullet It will create a HomingBullet when called from a SpaceEntity object
LongShooter
The Long Shooter is an enemy that has more hp than the galactic shooter but don't move and use an AimWeapon
MovementBonus
A class representing a movement bonus collectible entity in the game.
Player
The Player class is a subclass of the abstract superclass SpaceEntity.
RocketBullet
The RocketBullet class is a subClass of the superClass BulletEntity.
RocketWeapon
The RocketWeapon class is a subclass of the abstract superclass Weapon It represents a Weapon shooting a HomingBullet It will create a RocketBullet when called from a SpaceEntity object
SpaceEntity
The SpaceEntity class is an abstract class representing a generic space entity in the game.
SpaceInvaderGame
The SpaceInvaderGame class represents the main class of the Space Invader game.
SpeedBonus
A class representing a speed bonus collectible entity in the game.
SpriteAnimation
A class that handle all the multiple sprite animation of the game
TemporaryBonus
An abstract class representing a temporary bonus collectible entity in the game.
TimedWave
Represents a wave of ennemi that will arrive to the scene after an set elapsed time or when no ennemi are alive
ViewManager
The class that handle what is displayed on screen and a vast majority of the games logic
WaveParser
The WaveParser class will be used to create a new Wave at each call with next one contained in the file "WaveData.txt" To see the format of the WaveData file, see the ReadMe
Weapon
The Weapon class is an abstract class representing a generic weapon in the game.
WeaponBonus
A class representing a weapon bonus collectible entity in the game.
WriteInFile
A Class to Write in a file Mainly use to write log
